title: 316. Q&AF: Public Speaking 101, Communicating Honestly With Clientele & Attracting Supportive Customers
itunes:title: 316. Q&AF: Public Speaking 101, Communicating Honestly With Clientele & Attracting Supportive Customers
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to prepare for a public speaking event, how to communicate effectively with your clientele, and the most important thing to understand when trying to attract the right customers to your business.
